snippet.title: 🍁~ HYAKKI RINNE ~🍁 Episode 1
snippet.description:
In the era of great wars between Yokai (monster) and Onmyoji (exorcist), you are named to become the lord of all Yokai. For the Yokai followers , you devote all your powers to the battle, but it's matter of time until you realize your special feelings towards a few.

🌼Choice:

Um...

• I'm fine ↑❤️↑ Gen'u 
•I can't 

🌼Choice:

(Right. Gen'u always listens to me when I have problems like this. Maybe I should tell him...)

•Share my thoughts with Gen'u. 
•Go on ahead. ↑❤️↑Gen'u

🌼Choice:

(Gen'u' s saying that but...)

•Rest for a while 💎 ↑❤️↑Gen'u
•Keep running away

🌼Choice:

(What should I do... He's going to take me away at this rate!) 

•Try to talk to him 💎↑❤️↑ Yoizuki
•Resist desperately

🌼Choice:

•Show no hesitation ↑❤️↑Kanoe
•Hesitate
